indicator_name: Number of countries that have adopted legislative, administrative and policy frameworks to ensure fair and equitable sharing of benefits
target_name: Die ausgewogene und gerechte Aufteilung der sich aus der Nutzung der genetischen Ressourcen ergebenden Vorteile und den angemessenen Zugang zu diesen Ressourcen fördern, wie auf internationaler Ebene vereinbart
un_designated_tier: Tier I
un_custodian_agency: Secretariat of the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD)
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
page_content:
Exploring data sources
Suitable data sources for this indicator are currently being explored. This indicator is classified as Tier 3 and therefore no internationally established methodology or statistical standards are yet available. Corresponding methodologies or standards are being developed by the responsible international organizations and subsequently tested in cooperation with national statistical offices. If you have any feedback or suggestions on data please contact us through the contact form below.
target: Promote fair and equitable sharing of the benefits arising from the utilization of genetic resources and promote appropriate access to such resources, as internationally agreed
